suites.title: Messenger (Console / Logger) for Browser and Server, including `gulp` pipeline support

tests.title: should interpolate string
tests.fullTitle: Messenger (Console / Logger) for Browser and Server, including `gulp` pipeline support should interpolate string

tests.title: should test all messenger routines
tests.fullTitle: Messenger (Console / Logger) for Browser and Server, including `gulp` pipeline support should test all messenger routines
tests.code:
msg.Log('log');
msg.Info('info');
msg.Error('error');
msg.Success('success');
msg.Warning('warning');
msg.Warn("using `warn` shorthand");
msg.Note(chalk.gray('note, color supplied by `Chalk` instance'));
msg.Time('time');
msg.Debug('debug');
msg.Info('*','Bordered Output','=');
msg.Warning('Testing interpolation by <%=fname %> <%=lname %>', {fname: 'Mike', lname: 'Erickson'});
msg.Info({fname: 'Mike', lname: 'Erickson'});
msg.Line();
expect(true).to.be.equal(true);
done();

msg.Line('-',40);
done();

tests.title: should print lines before and after
tests.fullTitle: Messenger Line Test should print lines before and after
tests.code:
msg.Warn('=', 'Testing `Warn` message', '*');
msg.Warning('=', 'This is from `Warning` routine', '*');
expect(true).to.be.equal(true);

tests.title: should print lines before and after
tests.fullTitle: Messenger Line Test should print lines before and after
tests.code:
msg.Error('=', 'Now trying `Error containing `=` ');
expect(true).to.be.equal(true);

tests.title: should print lines before and after
tests.fullTitle: Messenger Line Test should print lines before and after
tests.code:
msg.Success('', 'A `Success` line after this message containing `x` ', 'x');
expect(true).to.be.equal(true);

passes.title: should test all messenger routines
passes.fullTitle: Messenger (Console / Logger) for Browser and Server, including `gulp` pipeline support should test all messenger routines
passes.code:
msg.Log('log');
msg.Info('info');
msg.Error('error');
msg.Success('success');
msg.Warning('warning');
msg.Warn("using `warn` shorthand");
msg.Note(chalk.gray('note, color supplied by `Chalk` instance'));
msg.Time('time');
msg.Debug('debug');
msg.Info('*','Bordered Output','=');
msg.Warning('Testing interpolation by <%=fname %> <%=lname %>', {fname: 'Mike', lname: 'Erickson'});
msg.Info({fname: 'Mike', lname: 'Erickson'});
msg.Line();
expect(true).to.be.equal(true);
done();

expect(true).to.be.equal(true);
done();
